Articles.Content:
How do I post a pic from my ksp screenshots onto this forum????

Edited April 21, 2014 by Billyk88
If anyone knows please let me know cause I have no idea how to put images on here. thank you
My sig. Check it. Seen this question for the fourth time today lol.

Another note is with Imgur you can also display whole albums! All you need to do is only have the album address (the set of 5 random letters and numbers after the last slash) wrapped in imgur tags. I have also used spoiler tags so that those with slower connections don't have to wait to view the words. (Simply quote this post to see how I did it!)

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Thank you everyone and immashift great guide thank you

(With regard to a deleted comment...) There's no need to make fun of people for not knowing how to do things. I had to have somebody show me how to link pics when I joined this forum as well.

Edited April 21, 2014 by Vanamonde
